content.body: are there companies that don't constantly beat you over the head with goal-setting?
(* not a shot on my employer; I just kind of assumed that it's all varying shades of painful wherever you go)
Matrix doesn't have an `/away` equivalent, does it?
content.formatted_body: Matrix doesn't have an /away equivalent, does it?

content.body: rkirsling unless you go into mgmt, there are no levels/titles - so no concept of mini-promos to justify. Most of the perf work falls on the mgr not the individual. Individuals are free to not write any back story for the year yet can still get fair raises if the work they did was good. This is my personal take.
content.formatted_body: rkirsling unless you go into mgmt, there are no levels/titles - so no concept of mini-promos to justify. Most of the perf work falls on the mgr not the individual. content.body: I guess the closest equivalent is changing display name.
Yeah, Yulia did that last week and I think it worked well.
status messages before status messages were a thing i guess
And it did set a status message visible via `/whois`
